column4: dull404~ That was on the ubuntu-users mailing list recently.  You get that error if the partition with the boot image on is so large that the image isn't within the first 1024 sectors.  (I think.)
never had that problem before.. been using several distros with grub
i was so eager to read it :) thanks dude
damn those gentoo guys must have all the best docs.. happens all the time :P
